body_html:
@4F2E4A2E I am referring to the unsupported wheel error you've got trying to install TensorFlow through Powershell, which is not a TensorFlow bug neither Powshell's but derived from a misconfiguration on your side. Then I mentioned one possible and common cause of this error which is multiple python installations and pip linking to an unsupported one (e.g. 2.7, 3.6 etc in this case).

The issue 9273 is a different situation non related to the problems you reported.

The only case to be addressed now is if there is any conflict using TensorFlow in a conda environment on PowerShell as you mentioned.
